doc.summary: Gets a <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/Component">text component</ref> as a string formatted with ANSI escape codes to  be printed on the console.
doc.text: Gets a <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/Component">text component</ref> as a string formatted with ANSI escape codes to  be printed on the console.

doc.summary: Turns a <ref cls="com/google/gson/JsonElement">JsonElement</ref> to a <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/Component">Component</ref> with syntax highlighting that can be used for display.
doc.text: Turns a <ref cls="com/google/gson/JsonElement">JsonElement</ref> to a <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/Component">Component</ref> with syntax highlighting that can be used for display.

doc.summary: Adds a <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/ClickEvent">click event</ref> to the given component to copy the given text to clipboard.
doc.text: Adds a <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/ClickEvent">click event</ref> to the given component to copy the given text to clipboard.

doc.summary: Gets a sub-sequence from the given <ref cls="net/minecraft/util/FormattedCharSequence">FormattedCharSequence</ref>.
doc.text: Gets a sub-sequence from the given FormattedCharSequence. The sub sequence will include all characters from start (inclusive) to the end of the sequence.

doc.summary: Gets a sub-sequence from the given <ref cls="net/minecraft/util/FormattedCharSequence">FormattedCharSequence</ref>.
doc.text: Gets a sub-sequence from the given FormattedCharSequence. The sub sequence will include all characters between start (inclusive) and end (exclusive). start and end may not be negative but may be greater that the length of the sequence.
